Transhumanism is a liminal state between human and posthuman

Last updated on April 9, 2021

A posthuman is an individual so radically augmented by means of technology that granting them human status is no longer trivial. In this context, transhumanism is the liminal phase between human and posthuman, characterized by a technological explosion.
